metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9797 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-origin images can be read in violation of the same-origin policy by exporting an image after using createImageBitmap to read the image and then rendering the resulting bitmap image within a canvas element. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 66.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '66.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu3').
